thread.title: Olivia Samuelson kicks her way into Rock Island football history | wqad.com
thread.title_full: Olivia Samuelson kicks her way into Rock Island football history | wqad.com

author: Shelby Kluver (WQAD)
title: Olivia Samuelson kicks her way into Rock Island football history | wqad.com
text: ROCK ISLAND, Ill. â€” On Friday, August 30, Rock Island senior Olivia Samuelson [kicked her way into the history books](https://www.facebook.com/friendsofrockislandfootball/posts/pfbid05rrad5cQzicahb3oDTGGWQD6w7nX49UvVH16Qd8MUvhkivfE3o142J4eMaaRbJpil?locale=he_IL). Samuelson kicks for the Rock Island varsity football team. After making the post-touchdown extra point kick, she solidified her stance as the very first woman to score for the varsity Rocks. Rock Island football is celebrating its 125th season this year. Samuelson wears #13 on the field. Video of her history-making kick shows the ball going nearly straight down the center of the goalpost. When she's not on the football field, Samuelson also plays for the Rock Island varsity soccer team, where she has earned numerous awards, including a [May 2024 player of the game](https://www.maxpreps.com/il/rock-island/rock-island-rocks/athletes/olivia-samuelson/?careerid=gdqiq9km2jdh1) honor. She is also #13 on the soccer pitch. Tune into The Current from 4 to 5 p.m. on weekdays to catch live interviews impacting you, your family and your hometown as well as all of the biggest headlines of the day.
